Info

Defines class Requester with attribute(s) and method(s). Builds HTTP or HTTPS requests with custom parameters including URL, data, headers, and security options.

class testspeednet.net.utils.requester.Requester[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class Requester with attribute(s) and method(s). Builds HTTP or HTTPS requests with custom parameters including URL, data, headers, and security options.

It defines:

attributes:
_TOOL_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
methods:
build_request - Creates and returns a Request object
with custom parameters.
_TOOL_VERBOSE: str = 'TEST_SPEED_NET::NET::UTILS::REQUESTER'¶
classmethod build_request(url: str, data: Any | None = None, headers: Dict[str, str] | None = None, bump: str = '0', secure: bool = False) → Request[source]¶

Creates and returns a Request object with custom parameters.

This method constructs a URL with an optional scheme (HTTP/HTTPS), appends a timestamp and a bump parameter for cache control, and sets the provided headers or adds a default header to disable caching.

Parameters:

  • url (<str>) – The base URL for the request. If it starts with ‘:’, HTTP or HTTPS is prefixed.

  • data (<Optional[Any]>) – Optional data to be sent with the request.

  • headers (<Optional[Dict[str, str]]>) – Optional headers to be included in the request.

  • bump (<str>) – String used to append to timestamp for cache control.

  • secure (<bool>) – If True, the scheme https is used; otherwise, http.

Returns:

A configured Request object ready to be used with urlopen.

Return type:

<Request>

Exceptions:

None
